data.author: William James
data.quote: Give your dreams all you've got and you'll be amazed at the energy that comes out of you.

data.author: Sophia Loren
data.quote: Many people think they want things, but they don't really have the strength, the discipline. They are weak. I believe that you get what you want if you want it badly enough.

data.author: Swami Sivananda
data.quote: Put your heart, mind, intellect and soul even to your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
data.quote: If a man is called a street sweeper, he should sweep streets even as Michelangelo painted, or Beethoven composed music, or Shakespeare wrote poetry. He should sweep streets so well that all the hosts of heaven and Earth will pause to say, 'Here lived a great street sweeper who did his job well.'

data.author: Pope Paul VI
data.quote: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.

data.author: Stephen King
data.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.

data.author: J.G. Holland
data.quote: God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest.

data.author: Edward H. Harriman
data.quote: Much good work is lost for the lack of a little more.

data.author: Marvin Phillips (or an unknown author)
data.quote: The difference between try and triumph is a little umph.

data.author: Garth Henrichs
data.quote: The person who is waiting for something to turn up might start with their shirt sleeves.

data.author: Marcus Washling
data.quote: Those at the top of the mountain didn't fall there.

data.author: Robert Brault
data.quote: If you feel you are down on your luck, check the level of your effort.

data.author: Terri Guillemets
data.quote: You're either changing your life or you're not. No waiting for this or that or better weather or other hurdles. Hurdles are the change.

data.author: Chinese proverb
data.quote: Be not afraid of going slowly. Be afraid only of standing still.

data.author: Dutch proverb
data.quote: He who is outside his door has the hardest part of his journey behind him.

data.author: Margaret Thatcher
data.quote: I do not know anyone who has got to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but should get you pretty near.

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.quote: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and, if they canâ€™t find them, make them.

data.author: Arthur C. Clarke
data.quote: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.

data.author: Roy T. Bennett
data.quote: It's only after you've stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.

data.author: Roy T. Bennett
data.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
